data.actual_result: No animation appears and the search fails for the first time. You need to exist the search screen and re-search for the results to appear.
data.expected_result: The "Before searching this server...." animation appears as it used to show.
data.short_description: Searching something in a DM or a server in which you haven't searched anything ever before doesn't say "Before searching in this server....." anymore instead, the search just fails.
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server. - Send in some random messages. - Click on the magnifying glass to start a search and search something that'll give result.
